content: Additionally, we are actioning $15 million of annualized run rate fixed cost savings in the fourth quarter, a hard but prudent decision to continue to drive towards profitability in the face of a significant slowdown in advertising spend in the Enterprise business. We continue to expect our gross margins to return to the 60% to 65% range over the medium term as we realize synergies in our consumer business with more product offerings, scale our enterprise SaaS business, and prioritize high quality enterprise customers.
